name: French Kiss
description:
French kiss is a simple rhythm game about kissing a girl. Made for BOOOM Gamejam. Instructions

for pc

  • press x to kiss the girl
  • press up to follow the heartbeat

for gameshell

  • press b to kiss the girl
  • press up to follow the heartbeat
Credits

Alex:programming

Damien:music

莫菲：programming
